Privacy Policy

ZenScape is committed to protecting the privacy of our clients. This privacy policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal information.
Information Collection
  • We may collect personal information, including but not limited to, name, contact information, health history, and preferences, solely for the purpose of providing massage services.
  • Information is collected through our website, in-person consultations, and during massage sessions.
Use of Information
  • Personal information is used to schedule and provide massage services tailored to your needs.
  • We may use your contact information to send appointment reminders, updates, or promotional offers related to our services. You can opt out of these communications at any time.
Disclosure of Information
  • We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as required by law or as necessary to provide services.
  • Personal information may be disclosed to our staff and therapists solely for the purpose of providing massage services.
Data Security
  • We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
  • Despite our efforts, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security.
Retention of Information
  • We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this privacy policy or as required by law.
Your Rights
  • You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information held by us. Please contact us to exercise these rights.
  • By using our services, you consent to the collection and use of your personal information as outlined in this privacy policy.
Children's Privacy
  • Our services are not intended for individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from minors.
Changes to Privacy Policy
  • We reserve the right to update or modify this privacy policy at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting on this page.
Contact Us
  • If you have any questions or concerns regarding our privacy policy, please contact us.
Governing Law
  • This privacy policy will be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Norway and any disputes relating to this policy will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of that country.
